description.value:
Requirements You're wielding a combination weapon

You're comfortable wielding a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.10J0WjnfgRvriLXc]{Gun Sword}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.zHJEzmoybIfX1LaV]{Hammer Gun} or some other combination weapon, augmenting melee attacks with trigger attacks from the gun portion. When you make a successful ranged Strike against an enemy within your reach with the gun portion of your combination weapon, that enemy is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Off-Guard} against your next melee attack with the weapon.

When you make a successful melee Strike against an enemy with your combination weapon, the next ranged Strike you make against that enemy with the weapon doesn't trigger reactions that would trigger on a ranged attack but not a melee attack, such as @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.NMWXHGWUcZGoLDKb]{Reactive Strike}. Either of these benefits is lost if not used by the end of your next turn.
